EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 34 PERSONS ON BOARD ADRIFT. LAST KNOWN
POSITION IN 32-44.00N 019-30.00E AT 020912Z NOV.
